text: Amazon is offering a great deal on the latest model Apple Watch Series 10, the M2 MacBook Air, and AirTags 4-pack, don’t miss these if you’re in the market for some new Apple gear. Apple Watch Series 10 – $329 (down from $399) Apple Watch Series 10 is discounted 18% on Amazon, available in a variety of colors and band options for just $329. You’ll get a 42mm always-on display, all-day battery life, fitness and activity tracking features, heart rate monitor, ECG, crash detection, fall detection, Emergency SOS, ovulation tracking, GPS, pinch gestures, water resistance, voice control, Siri commands, and more. Get Apple Watch Series 9 for $329 (check out color options, down from $399 MSRP) M2 MacBook Air 13″ for $799 Amazon has the M2 MacBook Air for just $799 for the 16GB RAM / 256GB storage model when you clip the on-page coupon, bringing a 20% discount off the MSRP price of $999. The M2 chip might be the prior generation for MacBook Air, but it supports Apple Intelligence, is fast and energy efficient, and this is a great portable Mac for a good price. M2 MacBook Air 16/256 – $799 (clip the on-page coupon, down from $999) AirTags 4-pack for $70 (down from $99) Amazon continues to offer a great discount on the AirTags personal trackers, bringing a 4-pack for just $70, down from the $99 retail price. html:
Amazon is offering a great deal on the latest model Apple Watch Series 10, the M2 MacBook Air, and AirTags 4-pack, don’t miss these if you’re in the market for some new Apple gear.

Apple Watch Series 10 – $329 (down from $399)

Apple Watch Series 10 is discounted 18% on Amazon, available in a variety of colors and band options for just $329. You’ll get a 42mm always-on display, all-day battery life, fitness and activity tracking features, heart rate monitor, ECG, crash detection, fall detection, Emergency SOS, ovulation tracking, GPS, pinch gestures, water resistance, voice control, Siri commands, and more.

  • Get Apple Watch Series 9 for $329 (check out color options, down from $399 MSRP)

M2 MacBook Air 13″ for $799

Amazon has the M2 MacBook Air for just $799 for the 16GB RAM / 256GB storage model when you clip the on-page coupon, bringing a 20% discount off the MSRP price of $999. The M2 chip might be the prior generation for MacBook Air, but it supports Apple Intelligence, is fast and energy efficient, and this is a great portable Mac for a good price.

  • M2 MacBook Air 16/256 – $799 (clip the on-page coupon, down from $999)

AirTags 4-pack for $70 (down from $99)

Amazon continues to offer a great discount on the AirTags personal trackers, bringing a 4-pack for just $70, down from the $99 retail price. Keep track of your car, purse, backpack, bike, dog, cat, purse, luggage, package, or just about anything else you might want to track with the Find My network.

  • AirTags – 4-pack – $69.99 (down from $99)

FTC: OSXDaily is an affiliate partner with Amazon, meaning if you click a link and make a purchase, we may receive a small payment which goes towards keeping the site running.
